query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and her iconic hits, like 'I Will Always Love You', reshape the landscape of pop and R&B music during the 1980s and 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie’s ability to reinvent his musical style and persona influence the genres of rock and pop music throughout his career?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting with Queen elevate the band's status in rock music history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal range, impacted contemporary music and inspired a new generation of artists?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's messages of peace and social justice in his music contribute to the global spread of reggae and the cultural movements of his time?
